WORK DURATION: 4, 8 OR 12 MONTHS (An 8 month employment period is registered as 2 separate, consecutive work terms, and a 12 month employment period is registered as 3 separate, consecutive work terms). Please state CLEARLY in your cover letter whether you are available for 4, 8 or 12 months.

Note For Engineering Undergraduate Students: Before applying to this posting, it is your responsibility to have completed the appropriate pre-requisite courses for this length of work term, and to understand how this length of work term affects your academics. If this means you will be registered in a 5th or higher work term, the full co-op tuition fee (equal to two installments) will be charged for each additional work term above the mandatory four.

NEED HELP TO RELOCATE? If you're traveling outside Victoria for a co-op work term, you may be eligible for a limited $1,000 travel stipend through the Strategic Framework Experiential Learning Fund (SF-ELF). For details, see the section "Co-operative Education Travel Awards for Work Terms outside Victoria".

Our Team is Growing

Thornhill Medical's mission is to deliver unique medical devices, using the lung as a portal, to transform current diagnostic and therapeutic patient care. And our vision is making the inconceivable a reality. Our devices have evolved from fundamental scientific and engineering principles into novel medical devices, resulting in medical care not previously thought feasible, or even possible. And we are growing!

Why You'll Love Working with the Thornhill Medical Team

Be a part of a team of high-calibre, mission driven individuals in our fast-paced, multi-disciplinary environment. As part our talented and high-energy team, your contribution will help improve the lives of patients around the world.

Every day is different: we offer endless, interesting work.
We bring out the passion in our people, fostering an environment of infinite curiosity and innovation.
We strive to make the world a better place, every day.
We are an inclusive, collaborative team integrating diverse perspectives to drive better results.

Co-op Internship

Are you interested in breathing sciences, medical devices, or medical innovations? We are looking for current students in engineering, medicine, biomedical systems or respiratory sciences, and are interested in making a difference in the world.

Apply by email to careers@thornhillmedical.com for a summer and/or co-op internship position. Submit your resume with a cover letter that describes what you are currently studying and why a placement at Thornhill Medical would make a difference.
